amendment.description: Amendment to increases funding for the rural broadband Distance Learning and Telemedicine Grant Program by $25,000,000, offset by an equal decrease in the Office of the Chief Information Officer Fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 105 printed in Part B House Report 116-119 to Increases funding for the rural broadband Distance Learning and Telemedicine Grant Program by $25,000,000, offset by an equal decrease in the Office of the Chief Information Officer Fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pence amendment (A042) Agreed to by recorded vote: 425 - 6 (Roll no. 376).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pence amendment (A042) Agreed to by recorded vote: 425 - 6 (Roll no. 376).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A042) offered by Mr. Pence.
